# vImage.MultidimensionalLookupTable.InterpolationMethod.full

**Case**

Full linear interpolation.

## Declaration

```swift
case full
```

## Enumeration Cases

- **vImage.MultidimensionalLookupTable.InterpolationMethod.half**: Partial linear interpolation between vertices on gray axis and `N-1` nearest vertices.
- **vImage.MultidimensionalLookupTable.InterpolationMethod.none**: Nearest neighbor.

items.description: Partial linear interpolation between vertices on gray axis and `N-1` nearest vertices.
